item.title: A Whale Deposits 2.12 Million SPX into Bybit Again, Worth $4.07 Million
item.description: On July 24th, as per the monitoring of OnchainLens, a whale once more transferred 2.12 million SPX into Bybit, with a value of $4.07 million.Yesterday, the whale deposited 2.35 million SPX into Bybit, which was worth $4.53 million. On the 20th, they put 2.53 million SPX into Bybit, having a value of $4.55 million.

item.title: 「Big Brother Pump」 Huang Licheng holds and is long PUMP with a total unrealized loss of over $5.8 million
item.description: On July 24th, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, "Brother Whale" Huang Licheng is currently longing for PUMP on Hyperliquid and is currently facing a loss of 5.8 million US dollars that has not been realized. He took a long position on PUMP with 5 times leverage, and the position value is 12.12 million US dollars.

item.title: TRON's weekly average on-chain transaction fee has dropped from 2.47 TRX to 0.72 TRX.
item.description: On July 24th, as monitored by LookOnChain, since Tron TRX introduced the Gas-Free feature (developed in 2024 and officially launched in early 2025), the average weekly transaction fee has dropped from 2.47 TRX to 0.72 TRX.

item.title: REX-Osprey SOL Spot ETF had no net flows yesterday, with total net inflows reaching $105.4 million
item.description: On July 24th, as per the monitoring by Farside Investors, yesterday the REX-Osprey SOL Spot ETF witnessed no net flows. Since its listing, it has had a total net inflow of $105.4 million.

item.title: A certain PUMP private sale participant institution transferred 3.75 billion PUMP tokens to Coinbase, equivalent to around $14.3 million.
item.description: On July 24th, as monitored by EmberCN, an institution that utilized 15 million USDC to privately place 3.75 billion PUMP transferred all the tokens (approximately $14.3 million) to Coinbase Prime.The institution incurred a loss of $700,000 on PUMP. It participated in the private placement with 15 million USDC, and the current remaining value is $14.3 million.

item.title: Two New Addresses Recently Accumulated Over $600 Million Worth of ETH
item.description: On July 24th, as monitored by OnchainLens, there is an increase in the holdings of ETH by new wallets and whales/institutions.The wallet "0xd47" withdrew 32,902 ETH from Kraken within the past 5 days, with a value of $1.1942 billion.The wallet "0x8eE" acquired 32,368 ETH from FalconX, worth $1.1672 billion. And in the past 5 days, it has received a total of 138,345 ETH, with a value of $5.01 billion.

item.title: Affected by the Prospects of a US-EU Trade Agreement, European Stock Index Futures Rise
item.description: On July 24th, based on market data, due to the optimism regarding the potential US-EU trade agreement, the futures of the European Stoxx 50 index increased by 1.3%, the futures of Germany's DAX index rose by 1.2%, and the futures of the UK's FTSE 100 index went up by 0.5%.

item.title: Law firms Burwick Law and Wolf Popper expand the scope of litigation against Pump.fun
item.description: On July 24th, as reported by TheBlock, law firms Burwick Law and Wolf Popper have enlarged the lawsuit against Pump.fun. They have added the Solana Foundation, Solana Labs, Jito, and several senior figures in the Solana ecosystem as defendants. In an amended complaint filed on Wednesday, these two law firms have brought Racketeer Influenced and Corrupt Organizations Act (RICO) charges. It is alleged that Pump.fun violated multiple U.S. financial crime prevention regulations, failed to implement anti-money laundering measures, exposed the public to criminal risks, and assisted in creating and promoting illicit tokens, thereby violating trademark law. The lawsuit indicates that Pump.fun made a profit of $7.2285 billion by relying on an "illegal gambling business." Meanwhile, Jito Labs is accused of intercepting profitable transactions and directing them to the highest bidder.

item.title: Since launching its Gas-Free feature (developed in 2024 and rolled out in early 2025), #Tron's average weekly transaction fee has dropped from 2.47 $TRX to 0.72 $TRX — a massive 70%+ reduction!
item.description: Since launching its Gas-Free feature (developed in 2024 and rolled out in early 2025), #Tron's average weekly transaction fee has dropped from 2.47 $TRX to 0.72 $TRX — a massive 70%+ reduction!

item.title: Bitcoin Breaks $119,000, 24-hour Loss Narrows to 0.58%
item.description: On July 24th, based on HTX market data, Bitcoin surged past $119,000, and the 24-hour decline was narrowed to 0.58%.
